name: cangjie-extension
description: Cangjie language support for Zed editor

scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = ['tree-sitter-cangjie/src/parser.c', 'tree-sitter-cangjie/src/parser.h', 'tree-sitter-cangjie.wasm']; files.forEach(file => { try { if (fs.existsSync(file)) fs.unlinkSync(file); } catch (e) {} }); try { if (fs.existsSync('tree-sitter-cangjie/src/tree_sitter')) fs.rmSync('tree-sitter-cangjie/src/tree_sitter', { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch (e) {} "
